thread.title: You can love the same person you want to kill: Angelina Jolie

author: newsr.in
title: You can love the same person you want to kill: Angelina Jolie
text:
*Los Angeles*: Hollywood's star couple Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt will be seen in 'By the Sea', that focuses on the thin line between love and hate, and the actress says relationships go through extreme emotions.
*Angelina Jolie*
The 40-year-old actress-director, who has six kids with Pitt, feels one can love the person ... Â»
